description: They love to get everyone on the water, and kids are no exception. Discover, enjoy and progress with three different watersports with this super practical board.<br><br>The Snapper’s dimensions make it easy for young riders to manoeuvre and enable kids to hone their skills without being constrained to one particular sport. Easily transition between SUP, Windsurfing and surfing with removable handles and removable centre fin.<br><br>Years in development, our exclusive MSL material made from specially produced, high-density drop stitch gives a stronger and stiffer core means that not only are you setting your kids up for success, but the Snapper can handle anything you throw at it.<br><br>For kids up to 60kg.<br><br>Recommended set-up:<br><br>Remove deck handle and centre fin for surfing.<br><br>Remove centre fin for SUP.<br><br>Fit centre fin for Windsurfing. Windsurf Rig available separately - the windsurf mast plate fits the Red Paddle Co universal joint, we recommend partnering with our 1.5M windsurf rig for children.
name: 2024 9`4 Snapper
